title: Parallel Computing
description: Parallel architectures, design and analysis of parallel algorithms; distributed-memory, shared-memory and GPU computing; communication cost, scalability; MPI, OpenMP and OpenACC; tuning parallel programs for performance.
prerequisites: Prerequisite(s): COMPSCI 2SD3  or 3SD3. Completion of COMPSCI 3N03  or 4C03 is recommended.
schedule: Three lectures, one tutorial (one hour); one term
courseText: Parallel architectures, design and analysis of parallel algorithms; distributed-memory, shared-memory and GPU computing; communication cost, scalability; MPI, OpenMP and OpenACC; tuning parallel programs for performance.
